item.title: StrelaStealer: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee
item.description: Executive Summary StrelaStealer is a Malware Stealer that has been out since 2022. it steals Outlook and Thunderbird credentials. StrelaStealer searches for “logins.json” (account/password) and “key4.db” (password database) within the “%APPDATA%\Thunderbird\Profiles" directory to acquire the credentials for Thunderbird. StrelaStealer seeks out the Windows Registry from where it can retrieve the program’s key and “IMAP User”, “IMAP Server”, as well as the “IMAP Password” values. Since the latter is kept in an encrypted form, the malicious program employs the Windows CryptUnprotectData feature to decrypt it prior to exfiltration.
